Skip to content Lival Frontpage Products Downloads Our story Our partners What’s New Contact A Story of Light from the North Made in Finland – but why? We at Lival take great pride in inventing, designing and manufacturing our products in Finland. Having all these operations under one roof enables quick deliveries and unparalleled quality control. But what exactly makes Finland, of all the places in the world, the best possible location for us? Innovative Engineering Finland has an education system that is among the best in the world. At Lival the Finnish expertise and know-how help us utilize the newest innovations in the lighting field and thus provide our customers products with cutting-edge technology. Sustainability & Durability Finland is the world ́s most environmentally-friendly country and sustainability is in our DNA. Therefore we at Lival take energy efficiency and ecological issues seriously. By using the latest technology such as Citizen COB, we can reduce our need for raw material in smaller form factors. Award-winning Design Finland is known for its Scandinavian design. To meet all of our customers’ lighting needs in retail, fashion and food industry, we at Lival rely on our strong heritage in design. A brief history: Lighting the way for over 70 years Pioneer in lighting solutions, Lival was founded in Finland more than 70 years ago. Lival and Nordic Aluminium have worked together since 1962 when the story of Nordic Aluminium began under Nokia. Lighting tracks were manufactured under Nokia’s brand up until 1996 when Nordic Aluminium got its current name. Lival has been a majority owner of Nordic Aluminium since the early 2000’s, and collaboration between these two companies has matured to become a perfect combination in the professional lighting field. Lival today: Unique Lival Ecosystem Thanks to strong expertise in designing and manufacturing complete lighting systems, Lival today has a position as a globally leading manufacturer. We provide our customers with unique ecosystems consisting of projectors, downlights and linear fixtures that work seamlessly with Nordic Aluminium Global tracks and track adaptors. By controlling the supply of a versatile lighting track system and an extensive range of LED luminaries, we can manufacture and deliver a comprehensive portfolio of professional lighting solutions quickly and cost-effectively. Lival tomorrow: Shaping The Future of Lighting By combining our current competencies and expertise, there are no limits to what we can achieve. The next step for us is to shape the future of lighting with constant development and by making use of the latest technological advancements. To meet universal quality and technological standards also in the future, we invent, design and manufacture cutting-edge technology by utilizing the newest innovations in the lighting field, including high-quality optics, most advanced LED modules, and energy efficient drivers. With sustainable pricing strategy, we want to make high-end luminaires more affordable. Globally saleable innovations and cutting-edge technology such as Citizen COB help us offer an excellent balance between cost and performance. To keep Lival brand globally competitive we are ready to utilize both predominant as well as predicted technologies. Aligned investments also have a significant role in our future. Would you like to know more? We are happy to tell you more about our lighting solutions, designed for versatility and compatibility for various environments and installations. Contact us To learn more about our products that are a perfect fit for all indoor uses, from stores and restaurants to offices, we kindly ask you to discover our luminaire catalogue. Products Lival lival@lival.comShow all contacts > Search: Search

Skip to content Lival Frontpage Products Downloads Our story Our partners What’s New Contact CC Wireless Connect & Control Control of Luminaries via Bluetooth Technology CC Wireless Lival spotlights are globally known for their best balance in performance to cost. Equipped with CC Wireless connected adapters, you can design energy optimized lighting schemes for all areas of retail. Make Your Store’s Lighting Smart Upgrade to energy efficient, connected lighting without changes over the existing track installation. No new control wires needed, resulting to significant savings in installation time (Measured up to 25-50%). Energy and Cost Saving By integrating occupancy sensors and daylight harvesting to your luminaire network, you can save up to 80% in your energy consumption. Siirry sisältöön LAATUVALMISTAJA Menu Valomainos Oy Meistä Tuotteet ja palvelut Toteutuksia Yhteystiedot Johdattaa asiakkaan perille Ota yhteyttä Johdattaa asiakkaan perille Ota yhteyttä Johdattaa asiakkaan perille Ota yhteyttä Valomainos Oy Laadukkaat valomainokset jo vuodesta 1962. Olemme suomalainen perheyritys, joka on erikoistunut valomainosten valmistukseen. Valomainonta kiinnittää asiakkaasi huomion ja antaa arvokkaan ensivaikutelman. Valomainos johdattaa asiakkaasi perille ja nostaa yrityksesi imagon uudelle tasolle! Laaja valikoima valomainoksia Valikoimamme kattaa kaiken irtokirjainvalomainoksista ja kotelovalomainoksista neonvalomainoksiin ja somisteneoneihin. Valmistamme valomainostaulut ja mainosvalot sisä- ja ulkokäyttöön. Lisäksi valmistamme valaistuja kylttejä, opasteita, liikepaikkapylväitä, mainostorneja ja mainospyloneita. Tarjoamme myös räätälöityjä kokonaisratkaisuja huoltoasemille ja myymälöihin. Lue lisää palveluistamme Tuotteet ja palvelut Lue lisää Toteutuksia Katso täältä! Yhteystiedot Ota yhteyttä! Valovoimaista mainontaa jo vuodesta 1962 Kaikki tuotteemme valmistetaan alusta loppuun omalla tehtaallamme Nurmijärvellä Klaukkalassa. Käytämme tuotannossamme ainoastaan alan uusinta teknologiaa, ja tuotteemme täyttävät tiukat eurooppalaiset standardit. Jokainen valomainoksemme on CE-merkitty, mikä takaa niiden turvallisuuden ja laadun. Katso toteutuksiamme. Valomainokset alusta loppuun: suunnittelu, asennus ja huolto Emme ainoastaan valmista valomainoksia, vaan tarjoamme asiakkaillemme myös suunnittelu-, asennus- ja huoltopalveluita. Lisäksi teemme metallilevyjen laserleikkauksia. Asiantuntijamme varmistavat, että saat juuri sellaisen valomainoksen, joka parhaiten palvelee yrityksesi tarpeita. Ota yhteyttä tänään ja aloitetaan yhteistyö. Lue lisää meistä Teemme alihankintana laserleikkaukset ammattitaitoisesti. Nopeat toimitukset. Kysy lisää Turvallisin Nopein Luotettavin Valomainos Oy | Metsäkyläntie 3, 01800 Klaukkala | Puh. 09 8789 830 | valomainos@valomainos.fi Evästeseloste Ostolaskut sähköpostilla valomainos@valomainos.fi Rekisteriseloste

Tekmala OySuomalaista sairaalatekniikkaa Etusivu Yritys Tuotteet Valaisimet Tutkimusvalaisimet Toimenpidevalaisimet Yleisvalaisimet Vuodevalaisimet Suurennuslasivalaisimet Leikkausvalaisimet Yövalaisimet Lisävarusteet Kattokeskukset Potilaspaneelit Tesal-4LED Tesal-5LED Tetra-11LED Psykiatrian potilassänky Leikkauspöydät Sairaalakalusteet Sängyt ja tutkimuspöydät Yöpöydät Hoivatuolit Parflex sermijärjestelmä Teollisuusvalaisimet Ajankohtaista Yhteystiedot Ota yhteyttä Etusivu Tekmala Oy on vuonna 1986 perustettu perheyritys, joka toimii laadukkaiden sairaalavalaisimien ja potilaspaneeleiden valmistajana. Tekmala on suunnitellut, valmistanut ja markkinoinut sairaalateknisiä tuotteita suomalaisiin sairaaloihin, terveyskeskuksiin ja muihin julkisiin tiloihin jo yli 30 vuoden ajan. Tekmalan toimintaa ohjaavat korkeatasoinen laatu, muotoilu ja suomalaisuus. Tekmalalle tärkeitä arvoja ovat tyytyväiset asiakkaat ja hyvä palvelu, henkilöstön ammattitaito ja toiminnan tuloksellisuus. Tekmalan mallisto kattaa lähes kaikki sairaalatilat leikkaussaleista vuodeosastojen potilashuoneisiin. Tekmala edustaa Suomessa myös useita eurooppalaisia valmistajia, joiden tuotteistoihin kuuluvat mm. tutkimus-, toimenpide- ja leikkausvalaisimet, kattokeskukset, leikkauspöydät, sairaalakalusteet sekä teollisuusvalaisimet. Navigation Close Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products Blogs, News & Videos Company Knowledge base Contact us Atexor Downloads Atexor UK Find a Distributor Contact us Ex-Lighting Technology LeadersAtexor's team specializes in designing and manufacturing IECEx, ATEX and UKEX lighting for Explosion Hazardous Areas. In addition to ready-made products, we create custom designed solutions to meet specific customer requirements. Recognized around the world for our quality and reliability, all Atexor products and solutions are designed and manufactured in Finland. Ex-Lighting Solutions ATEX EUROFINS KOSHA NEPSI TÜV RHEINLAND EAC IECEx TIIS Ex CE 0537 CML UKEX NSN Atexor provides ATEX and IECEx certified lighting solutions for Ex Zones, as well as UKCA, KOSHA, NEPSI, DNV and other relevant product certifications. Ex-Expertise at Your ServiceWith over 40 years' experience creating lighting solutions for Explosion Hazard Areas, Atexor is a partner you can rely on. We are part of Teknopower Group, an expert in demanding lighting systems with partners operating in more than 30 countries. About us Meet the Team Get to know our team of highly motivated experts. We have decades of Ex-lighting experience and are ready to serve you. Read more Light Planning Our experienced specialists can create the optimal lighting plan for your Ex area. Read more Case Studies Learn about how the Atexor Ex-Lighting Solutions Team has worked hand-in-hand with customers to deliver bespoke Ex-lighting solutions. Read more Ex-Lighting ProductsIn addition to bespoke solutions, Atexor offers a range of ATEX and IECEx certified products, including SLAM® portable luminaires, SLAM FIXED® lighting, MICA® hand lamps, cables, fittings, and more. Find a product Handlamps Temporary luminaires Fixed luminaires Learn About Ex-LightingDifferent terminology for explosion protected or explosion proof lighting is sometimes used in different markets. However, Atexor can ensure that the lightings solutions we provide meet all safety requirements, wherever you are located. So whether you are looking for Ex-proof lights, Ex rated lights, explosion protected lights, explosion proof luminaires, hazardous area lighting, intrinsically safe LED lamps, or ATEX approved lighting, we can deliver what you need. Navigation Close Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products Blogs, News & Videos Company Knowledge base Contact us Atexor Downloads Atexor UK Find a Distributor Contact us Our company Atexor Oy is a privately-owned company that designs and manufactures ATEX, UKEX and IECEx lighting and power distribution for Explosion Hazardous Areas. We specialize in creating bespoke solutions for demanding requirements. Our customers recognize us for our quality and reliability. The Atexor team plays an active role on international committees developing standards for Ex-equipment. All Atexor lighting products are designed and manufactured in Finland. Part of Teknopower Group Atexor Oy is wholly owned by Teknopower Group. With partners in over 30 countries and a strong financial and technical position, Teknopower provides solid backing for Atexor. The Teknopower Group includes Atexor, Teknoware, and FLS Finland. Teknoware is a leading provider of vehicle and emergency lighting, including trains and ships. FLS Finland makes LED display systems, parking guidance and management solutions. Meet Our TeamOur team includes leading experts in the Ex-lighting industry, and our in-house experience is unmatched. We are ready to take on any Explosion Hazardous Area lighting challenge you have. Get to know us Our Customers Atexor serves customers in a wide range of industries and applications: oil and gas, petrochemical, refineries, mining, drill ships, manufacturing, mills, transport, firefighting, defense, chemicals, and semiconductors. Our customers rely on us to provide safe, dependable Ex-lighting for both portable and fixed applications in Ex Zones. Our Story Built on the combined excellence of Centaurea Oy and Mica Elektro Oy Ltd., Atexor Oy has 40 years of experience in Ex-lighting solutions. We continually strive to create better solutions for our customers around the world. In addition to our Finnish operations, we established Atexor Ltd. in the UK in 2016. Our in-house knowledge, skill and expertise give us exceptional, wide-ranging capabilities. We can design and manufacture everything from individual, bespoke luminaires to complete, turnkey Ex-lighting solutions. With an ISO 9001:2015 Management System and ATEX certified production, our products and solutions are the result of world-class engineering, proven through end-to-end testing. We have our own design, testing and manufacturing facilities in Finland, which helps us ensure quality and timely deliveries. Navigation Close Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products Blogs, News & Videos Company Knowledge base Contact us Atexor Downloads Atexor UK Find a Distributor Contact us Knowledge base Anti-static In an everyday context, we use ‘anti-static’ to refer to protection against that clinging effect you get, for example, with clothing when there’s a static charge build-up. In the Ex context, we more specifically talk about dissipation. See Dissipative. ATEX From the French ATmosphère EXplosible (Explosive Atmospheres), ATEX refers to a set of European Union (EU) directives regulating explosion protection. Learn more about ATEX. Blue Retina LEDs produce blue light which can damage the retina of the eye. Basically, humans do not recognize blue light as dangerous, so we don’t react to strong or excessive blue light exposure by turning away or blinking. Learn more about blue retina. Bulkhead Bulkhead used to refer to a particular type of especially durable fixed light. They were usually round or oval-shaped and featured a thick lens with a metal grate covering. You often find these types of lights in marine applications where heavy weather protection is required. While traditional bulkhead lights are still in use, today a bulkhead light can take many different forms. They are typically fixed luminaires and always feature heavy-duty durability making them ideal for harsh, industrial-grade applications. Candela (cd) The standard unit of measurement for luminous intensity, candelas are based on the luminous properties of a traditional candle. Technically, a lumen is measure of the energy and time (the ‘flux’) of the light output, whereas a candela is a measure of the energy, time and angle of the light. Candelas are interesting for scientific research, but when it comes to assessing how the human eye experiences light, candelas are not meaningful. This is why you typically don’t see candelas mentioned with commercial luminaires. Casambi Modern LEDs open up a wide range of possibilities when it comes to computerized lighting control. As an alternative to wired solutions like DALI, the Casambi solution uses Bluetooth to provide fine-tuned illumination control via the Casambi app on smartphones, tablets and even smart watches. CCC Short for China Compulsory Certification. The CCC issues certifications of equipment intended for export to the Chinese market. This includes Explosion Hazardous Area equipment and related explosion protection certificates. CE From the French Conformité Européenne (European Conformity). The ‘CE’ label is used by manufacturers to indicate that their product complies with all the applicable rules and requirements, called directives, defined by the European Commission (EC). Ex products, for example, must comply with a wide range of requirements under EC in addition to those set out by ATEX. If you see a 4-digit number under the CE logo, that tells you the identity of the Notified Body that did the CE assessment of the manufacturer. To the right you can see, for example Atexor’s CE logo. Certification At Atexor we like to emphasize this: the certification is your friend. It provides (or should provide) proof that the Ex equipment you are buying is what it claims to be. Learn more about certifications. Conductive If something is conductive, electricity can easily travel through it – generally not a good thing in Explosion Hazardous areas. Learn more about conductivity. Confined space Confined spaces are spaces completely or partially enclosed with restricted means for entry and exit. In the Explosion Hazardous world, confined spaces are particularly full of risks. Learn more about confined spaces. CRI Short for Color Rendering Index. On a scale from 1 to 100, CRI measures how an artificial light source compares to natural white light, with 100 being essentially identical to natural light. Learn more about the color rendering index. DALI Short for Digital Addressable Lighting Interface. This is the fancy name for the standardized interface allowing software-based control of a luminaire’s brightness. It used to be that the only way you could dim a light was with a mechanical knob or switch. With the digital method, you can adjust brightness and other things, like the color of the light, with software. Directive Within the European Union, ‘directive’ is used to refer to the rules and requirements defined by the European Commission. Dissipative To dissipate means to scatter or disperse. In our context, dissipative is an electrical property of the materials we use in Ex luminaires. Learn more about dissipation. DSEAR Short for Dangerous Substances and Explosive Atmospheres Regulations. The DSEAR is the UK legislation governing Explosion Hazardous Areas similar to the European Union’s ATEX directive. DSEAR compliance falls under the UK Health and Safety Executive. EAC Short for Eurasian Conformity. The EAC mark, like the CE mark in the EU, indicates that the product meets the requirements of all applicable technical regulations of the Euroasian Economic Commission (EEC) covering Russia, Kazakhstan, Belarus, Kirghistan and Armenia. They handle, among other things, the customs clearance for imports to Customs Union countries. EC type approval For certain lighting applications, additional certifications are needed within the EU. EC type approval is required for electrical equipment used in motor vehicles, for instance. The EC type approval certifies that the equipment meets certain requirements and provisions dealing with radio interference (electromagnetic compatibility) as defined by Directive 72/245/EEC and its amendments. In our case, EC type approval applies to the MICA® ILC chargers which can be installed in fire engines. The certification includes an “e-Nr.“ distinction which indicates the country where the product was certified. For example, “e-1” is Germany, “e-2” France and “e-17” is Finland. Ecodesign Directive The European Union Ecodesign Directive is a framework for reducing the environmental impact of products that consume energy. For product manufacturers, it establishes important principles for long-term sustainability of new products. This directive will likely have a noticeable impact in spare parts availability for existing products, as production of older, less energy-efficient components is ramped down. EM – Emergency Function When you are on the job, a power failure can turn expected challenges into potential danger. We designed our EM function for temporary work lights and hand lamps to specifically to address the risks power failures create. A combination of battery power and intelligent signaling helps workers stay safe when their main power supply is lost. Learn more about our EM function in SLAM® and MICA® products. EMC Short for Electro Magnetic Compatibility. Most markets around the world have implemented rules and regulations related to electric and magnetic interference. The basic principle is: do not disturb or be disturbed. For instance, the FM radio and GPS navigator in a car should be able to work at the same time without causing any trouble with signal reception. Ex-rated equipment sold within the European Union must comply with the EMC directive 2014/30/EU. Equipment Protection Level Equipment Protection Level (EPL) is defined by the international standard IEC/EN 60079. The assigned EPL of equipment indicates the risk level or ‘likelihood’ that the equipment can become a source of ignition. Learn more about Equipment Protection Level. Ex Also known as Explosion Proof, Explosion Protected, Ex Proof, Ex Rated – used worldwide as simple ways to say, “Explosion resistance.” Learn more about Ex. Explosion Hazard Many work sites have areas with potentially explosive atmospheres, also known as Ex Areas. These are common in a number of industries including petrochemical, paint, paper, wood processing, distilleries and grain silos, etc. And these are just a few examples of an almost endless list. An explosive atmosphere is created in the presence of flammable gases, vapors or dust. When mixed with oxygen and an ignition source, such as electrical equipment, an explosion can occur. The equipment you bring into an Ex area must be ATEX/Ex certified (no ignition source). Ex Zone Explosion Hazardous Areas are divided into zones according to risk probabilities. Within the European Union, these are defined by IEC/EN standards (IEC/EN 60079-10-1 or 2) as directed by ATEX. Learn more about Ex Zones. ExCB Short for Ex Certified Bodies. These are organizations who are approved to serve as notified bodies for Ex equipment, facilities and people. The list of ExCBs is maintained by IECEx and available on their public website. Floodlight High powered luminaires used to illuminate particularly large areas. Ex Floodlight can be fixed or portable. Our SLAM® Star is certified floodlight for portable use. GOST-R State approval agency in Russia that defines national standards for the Russian market. See also EAC. Hazardous Area This can mean the area in question has any type of hazard. But in the Ex world, this is short-hand for a number of phrases, including: Explosion Hazardous Explosion Hazardous Area Potentially Explosion Hazardous Area The important thing here is for people who work in such areas to understand what equipment is safe to use, and for manufacturers to know how to make products rated for these areas HSE Short for Health, Safety and Environment. Sometimes including also Quality (HSEQ), the HSE area is impacted by both local and international regulations and standards, such as ISO 14001. In many organizations, HSE guidelines cover lighting requirements and are relevant for fixed, temporary, as well as personal (e.g. backup flashlights), lighting choices. IEC Short for International Electrotechnical Commission. This is the all-important, internationally recognized authority that maintains International Standards related to electronics. Learn more about IEC. IECEx In a nutshell, this is the international body that oversees the requirements for Explosion Hazardous Areas as defined by IEC standards. Learn more about IECEx. INMETRO Short for Brazilian Institute of Metrology, Standardization and Industrial Quality. This is Brazil’s approval agency looking after Ex products. INMETRO follows IEC standards but have additional rules for the Brazilian market much like ATEX in the EU. For more information, visit the INMETRO website. Most of our SLAM® product family is INMETRO certified. Intrinsic Safety Governed by the international standard IECEx 60079-11, intrinsic safety is one method for making Ex products safe to use in hazardous areas. It means the product is safe by its very nature. For example, the energy used by the product is so low that it cannot possibly ignite anything. Learn more about intrinsic safety. IP Rating Short for Ingress Protection Rating. Defined by IEC 60529, we see the IP Rating topic come up frequently in consumer electronics like mobile devices and smartwatches. As the rating only deals with the penetration of dust or liquids into the product, it has its limitations in the Ex world where there is often the explosion risk from gas fumes. Naturally if you are working in Ex areas Zone 20 or 21, or you are otherwise working with liquids (like paints), IP Ratings matter. With Ex products, we typically use IP56 and IP66 ratings. The first digit of the rating indicates dust protection level, and the second digit is the liquid protection level. So, an IP56 rating means the product has level 5 dust protection. It’s not completely impervious (not dust tight), but most dust and dirt cannot get inside. And with level 6 protection against liquids, the product can withstand a reasonable spray, but should not be completely submerged in water. IP66 bumps the dust protection up to maximum – no dust particles can get inside. ITRI Short for Industrial Technology Research Institute. ITRI is the official agency in Taiwan that approves Ex equipment for use in Taiwan. Once certified, the product must carry the TS Mark label as shown to the right here. For more information, visit the ITRI website. KOSHA Short for Korea Occupational Safety and Health Agency. Like INMETRO in Brazil, this is the local authority responsible for Ex product imports and distribution. For more information, visit the KOSHA website. LED Short for Light-Emitting Diode. The go-to modern day light source, LEDs have come a long way from their humble beginnings as little red indicators. In addition to visible light, they can be used to generate infra-red and even ultra-violet light. Learn more about LEDs. Light Fixture Light fixtures (UK English ‘light fittings’) in the everyday context refers to the whole luminaire – the light-emitting element (lamp or LED), the housing, the stand or mount, and the electrical wiring. Learn more about light fixtures. Linear A linear luminaire or work light has one or more rows of LEDs aligned end-to-end on one side which provide 180 degree illumination for long spaces. First linear lights started to be seen in buildings around the 1950s in industrial spaces, with the use of fluorescent tubes. Link to Atexor’s range of fixed linear lighting called SLAM FIXED Novo. Low Voltage Low voltage is a term we commonly see in the Explosion Hazardous world, although it is not actually an explosion protection topic. This is, however, a hot topic for confined spaces which may or may not have Ex-rated areas, but almost always include an increased risk of electrocution. Learn more about low voltage. Lumen (lm) This is the standard unit of measurement for brightness or ‘luminous flux.’ With incandescent bulbs, we used watts (energy consumption) to indicate the brightness of a bulb. As more energy efficient technology became available, however, watts were no longer a clear indicator of how much light you actually get out of a luminaire. So today we indicate the brightness of a luminaire in lumens. As an example, a traditional 40-Watt incandescent bulb produces between 400 and 500 lumens. A comparable LED bulb in terms of lumens may consume as little as 5 Watts. Luminaire A general term for any light-emitting product. We tend to use this term in the Ex business because it covers all types of lighting solutions. In modular systems, using this term also allows us to address properties of a luminaire separate from those of, for example, cables and mounting brackets which have their own special properties for Ex areas. Lux (lx) This is the standard unit of measure of luminescence, or how much light is hitting a given surface. Since we know that one lux is equal to one lumen per square meter, we can calculate how much light (lumens) is needed to illuminate a given space. Learn more about lux. NATO Stock Number (NSN) NATO Stock Number is a 13-digit numeric code used by the NATO alliance, identifying all the ‘standardized material items of supply’ as recognized by all NATO members. The code contains information about, for example, material group, material class, country of origin. NSN has been implemented in all contracting countries. Many countries that are not members of NATO also use the NSN program. Several Atexor products have an NSN Stock Number. Please ask for more. NEPSI Short for National Supervision and Inspection Center for Explosion Protection and Safety of Instrumentation. NEPSI is one of the notified bodies specializing in testing and certifying Ex equipment for the China market. For more information, visit the NEPSI website. Notified Body A notified body is a government-approved organization in that is allowed to certify that products, processes, people and organizations comply with a given regulation or standard for EX areas within the EU (ATEX directives). Government authorities control and audit notified bodies in most countries, though the exact setup is not always so clear. However, there are mechanisms in place just about everywhere to help resolve conflicts of interest and ensure notified bodies remain objective and trustworthy. For IECEx approvals, we talk about Ex Certified Bodies (see ExCB). The list of approved ExCBs is maintained by IECEx. OP IS These letters are used to indicate a product complies with the safety standards for optical radiation (also called ‘optical irradiation’). High-powered LED luminaires can create an ignition source if they are not designed to take into account the radiated energy of the LEDs. This can be a significant risk as LED technology continues to increase the power generated by each diode. We recommend reading Tarmo Rintala’s article about optical radiation from the June 2018 issue of HarzardEx. He also has made a presentation about the principle risks of high-powered LEDs that is worth a look. RoHS Short for Restriction of Hazardous Substances. This European Union directive puts very strict rules on the use of dangerous substances in electronics, such as lead and mercury. All products, including spare parts and cables, sold in the EU must adhere to these rules. The RoHS does not currently have a marking of its own. It is assumed that if a product uses the CE mark, it complies with the RoHS directive. ATEX directives do not add additional RoHS requirements. SafeEye LEDs have revolutionized the lighting industry. There is a drawback, though. The raw light from powerful LEDs is so bright that it can hurt your eyes. Particularly if you are working in dark conditions, looking straight at an LED light can be temporarily blinding and even painful. Our SafeEye solution ensures Atexor work lights and luminaires remain safe for worker’s eyes even when the lumens output is high. A specially designed diffuser spreads the light beam emanating from the LED to avoid glare without significantly reducing lumens. For example, our SLAM® and SLAM FIXED® product families use SafeEye technology. Safety Lamp Back in the day, coal miners started calling lanterns with an enclosed flame “safety lamps.” Open flames in coal mines were a big problem, regularly causing deadly explosions. Attempts to help mitigate explosion risks stretch all the way back to the 1700s. Learn more about safety lamps. Safety light This is a common term used to refer to many different types of lights, from a yellow light on a traffic barrier to a red light on the back of a bicycle. Unfortunately, the term is sometimes also incorrectly used to denote Ex luminaires. In the Ex world, we prefer to emphasize the fact that safety is always more than just a single piece of equipment. People, products and places together make (or break) safety. Temperature Class (T1, T2, T3, T4, T5 & T6) Temperature class (also known as ‘T-rating’) defines the explosion hazard type for the Ex product. The class, from 1 to 6, indicates the highest temperature allowed without igniting anything in the area. Class defines risks of a zone in a given area. Learn more about Temperature Class. ‘U’ in Ex certification number If you see a ‘U’ at the end of an Ex certification number, it means the certification is for a component. The ‘U’ certificate is for the Ex component only. Ex equipment requires a single, independent Ex certification. A collection Ex component certificates does not fulfill this requirement. UKCA / UKEX Short for UK Conformity Assessed. The UKCA Ex Certification (UKEX) is part of the UKCA product marking framework. UKCA generally corresponds to the CE product marking of the EU and is intended for products sold in England, Scotland and Wales. Atexor implemented UKCA as part of our certification process, so our latest products include UKEX markings. For the latest information on the status of UKCA, please visit GOV.UK. UL Short for Underwriters Laboratories. UL are the leading authorities in the United States certifying product compliance with quality, safety and other standards. This includes all Ex-related certifications. Products that have passed the rigorous certification tests get a unique certificate number and permission to use the “UL” label on product. UL listing See also UL. The UL listing is a collection of products that UL, a widely respected certification body, has tested and certified. UL actively maintains this list, meaning it audits products it has already certified and may remove them if the product manufacturer fails the audit. WEEE Short for Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment. Within the European Union, the WEEE directive lays out rules for collecting and recycling waste from electronic devices, from industrial equipment to household appliances and toys. Compliant products must carry the WEEE recycle bin logo. ‘X’ in Ex certification number If you see an ‘X’ at the end of an Ex certification number, it means there are special conditions for use of the Ex equipment. This is perfectly acceptable for Ex equipment certification. However, the special condition(s) must be explained in the Ex equipment documentation. Disclaimer The information in this knowledge base is provided ‘as is’ without guarantees for accuracy or completeness. Our intention here is to explain key terms and topics in simple, straight-forward language based on our current understanding of the relevant source materials and our own experiences. The contents herein are subject to change as we gain new information and insights. Contact usOur team is ready to help solve your Ex-lighting needs! Etusivu Teippaukset Autoteippaukset Ikkunateippaukset aurinkosuojakalvot Valomainokset Led-valomainokset Valomainos huolto Myymälämainonta Suunnittelupalvelu Mainostekstiilit Referenssit Yhteystiedot Valitse sivu Valomainokset Toteutamme valmistuksen ja asennuksia seuraavasti: Ketjujen valomainokset Yritykset Kivijalkamyymälät Pyydä tarjous Valomainokset nykytekniikalla Valomainokset toteutetaan nykyään led-tekniikalla ja ne ovat näyttäviä ja energiatehokkaita. Valomainos on myös pitkäaikainen investointi, jonka tulee säilyä moitteettomassa kunnossa lukuisia vuosia. Näin ollen mainoksen laatu on äärimmäisen tärkeää. Valmistamme ja asennamme korkealaatuiset ja kestävät valomainokset led-tekniikalla koko Suomen alueelle. Monipuoliset LED-valomainokset Valomainokset on mahdollista toteuttaa hyvin monipuolisesti – vain mielikuvitus on rajana. Valomainokset voidaan valmistaa irtokirjainmainoksena tai kotelomainoksena. Kotelomainoksen valaistus voi olla todella tehokas ja kotelon etupinnalle on mahdollista tulostaa minkälainen kuva tahansa. Nykyään on saatavilla myös LED-kehyksiä, joihin voidaan sijoittaa esimerkiksi valaistu juliste. LED-valomainospylväät puolestaan ovat maahan asennettavia mainoksia, joiden korkeus vaihtelee parista metristä jopa kymmeneen metriin. LED-valomainospylväs on näyttävä ratkaisu, joka näkyy todella pitkälle ja houkuttelee asiakkaita pidemmänkin matkan takaa. Toteutamme kaiken kokoiset ja kaiken muotoiset valomainokset – tutustu toteuttamiimme valomainoksiin ja muihin mainosratkaisuihimme galleriassamme. Irtokirjainmainokset toteutamme täysin toiveidesi mukaisesti haluamallasi tekstin tai logon muodoilla. Normaalisti LED-kotelomainokset ovat suorakaiteen muotoisia, mutta muutkin muodot ovat mahdollisia. Palvelumme sisältää kaiken suunnittelusta valomainosten asennukseen Meiltä saat ilmaisen mittaus- ja suunnittelupalvelun. Tarjoamme apua ja neuvontaa muun muassa valomainoksen sijoittelussa ja teknisissä asioissa. Valomainoksissa kannattaa esimerkiksi käyttää hämäräkytkintä. Näin valomainos syttyy ainoastaan hämärällä ja sähkökustannukset pienenevät. Palvelumme sisältää myös valomainosten asennuksen ja kytkennän. Kun valomainokselle on vedetty valmiiksi sähkösyöttö, kytkemme sen kiinni asennuksen yhteydessä. Valomainoksen energiatehokkuus Valomainoksissa käytetään nykyään poikkeuksetta LED-tekniikkaa. LED-mainokset säästävät energiakustannuksissa – ne kuluttavat huomattavasti vähemmän sähköä kuin vanhat neonputki- tai loisteputkimainokset. Lisäksi LED-tekniikalla tehty mainos on hyvin näyttävä. Nykyään neonvalomainokset alkavat olla kokonaan historiaa. Neonputkia valmistetaan enää vain muutamassa paikassa ja neonmuuntajia ei saa enää lainkaan. Loisteputkimainoksia on vielä monissa paikoissa, mutta niidenkin sähkönkulutus on todella suurta verrattuna energiatehokkaaseen LED- tekniikalla toteutettuun valomainokseen. Valomainos irtokirjaimilla Led-irtokirjainvalomainokset ovat näyttäviä pimeässä sekä myös valoisalla ja ne herättävät hyvin huomiota pimeällä. Rakennamme aina valomainoksemme Suomen säätä kestäviksi sekä käytämme pitkäikäisiä led-valoja. Voimme tehdä led-irtokirjainvalomainoksista aivan sinun tarpeidesi mukaisen mainoksen. Led-valomainokset on myös mahdollista saada logonne muotoisena sekä tekstin muotoisena. Valomainoskotelot Led-valomainoskotelot ovat yleisesti suorakaiteen muotoisia, mutta ne on mahdollista saada juuri tarpeidesi kokoisena sekä muotoisena. Näissä kotelovalomainoksissa laskemme tarkasti ledien määrän, jotta valoteho on riittävä, mutta mainos on silti energiatehokas. Valomainospylväät Valomainospylväät ovat maassa seisovia valaistuja pylväitä, joiden korkeus voi olla muutamasta metristä jopa kymmeneen metriin. Led-valomainospylväät ovat näyttäviä ja näkyvät todella kauas ja näin ollen houkuttelevat asiakkaita pidemmänkin matkan päästä. Pyydä tarjous  Suunnittelupalvelu Saat käyttöösi suunnittelijan joka luo valomainoksesta yrityksellenne sopivan visuaalisen ilmeen.  Parhaat materiaalit valmistuksessa Käytämme valomainostuotannossa parhaiden markkinoilla olevien valmistajien materiaaleja. Autamme aina asiakasta myös oikeanlaisen materiaalin valinnassa.  Osaavat asentajat Junnu Neon Oy:n valomainosasentajt ovat läpikäyneet tarvittavat koulutukset, jotta työntekijät pystyvät tekemään loistavaa työnjälkeä. Henkilökunnallamme on vuosien kokemus erilaisten valomainosten asennuksista. Etusivu Teippaukset Autoteippaukset Ikkunateippaukset aurinkosuojakalvot Valomainokset Led-valomainokset Valomainos huolto Myymälämainonta Suunnittelupalvelu Mainostekstiilit Referenssit Yhteystiedot Valitse sivu Loistavaa mainonnan tuotantoa yrityksille vuodesta 1994 Valomainosten myynnistä, suunnittelusta, asennuksesta ja huollosta on meillä kokemusta, jo kolmannessa sukupolvessa.Olemme toimittaneet luottamuksella valomainoksia, ikkunateippauksia sekä opasteita, niin isoille kuin pienille yrityksille, ympäri Suomea sekä Baltian maihin ja Venäjälle. Pyydä tarjous Valomainokset teippaukset Mainostekstiilit Miksi valita meidät kumppaniksi? Kaiken toimintamme perustana on luotettavuus, ammattitaito ja toimitusvarmuus. Tästä syystä asiakasuskollisuutemme on erittäin korkeaa luokkaa. Emme vain myy ja asenna mainostuotteita, vaan hoidamme myös niiden huoltamisen. Näiden lisäksi saat meiltä kattavat palvelut mainontaan ja markkinointiin suunnittelusta täydellisiin toimituksiin. Pyydä tarjous Asiakkaitamme: Valomainokset Valomainokset ovat pitkäikäinen investointi. Valomainosten odotetaan säilyvän hyvässä kunnossa sekä uudenveroisena vuosia, siksi valomainosten laatu on tärkeä toimituksissa. Junnu Neon Oy valmistaa ja asentaa itse valomainokset kaikkialle Suomeen ja Baltian alueille Pitkä kokemuksemme mainosalalla takaa jatkuvan kehittymisen sekä laajenemisen ideoiden toteutukseen sekä asiakkaiden tyytyväisyyteen. Pyydä tarjous Lue lisää Teippaukset Mainosteippaukset ovat mainio tapa mainostaa yritystä. Teippauksella saat mainospinta-alaa ja näkyvyyttä yrityksellesi aina siellä missä väkijoukot liikkuvat. Autojen lisäksi teippaamme mm. veneitä, rekka-autoja, moottoripyöriä ja linja-autoja. Periaattessa teippaamme mitä vain, mihin teippi tarttuu. Autoteippaukset Teippaamme kaikenlaiset autot yrityksille ja kunta- ja kaupunkisektorin toimijoille. Ikkunateippaus Ikkunateippaus erilaisiin kohteisiin Auringonsuojakalvot Aurinkosuojakalvot ja tummennuskalvot autoihin ja ikkunoihin Pyydä tarjous Lue lisää Mainostekstiilit Mainostekstiileillä saatte yrityksen työntekijöille yhtenäisen ilmeen. Logolla tai mainoksilla painetut t-paidat ja lippikset tekevät ammattimaisen vaikutuksen Pyydä tarjous Lue lisää Vauhdilla asiaan! Kysy meiltä yrityksesi mainostusratkaisuihin liittyvistä asioista. Palvelemme mielellämme GSM – 0400 611 616 Kysy lisää Mitä asiakkaat sanovat meistä Huippu palvelu. Ammattitaitoiset teippaajat ja tosi mukava meininki. Vahva suositus! Vuonna 1998 valaisinten valmistus siirtyi Keraplastille ja vuonna 2022 Fostolle. Akryylin tulo valaisimiin 1950 ja 1960 -luvuilla merkitsi uutta aikaa sisustuksessa. Valaisimien ajattomat muodot ja hienostunut valo toivat uuden ilmeen koteihin ja julkisiin tiloihin. Sävy-sävyyn hienosäädetyt valaisimet antavat viimeistellyn ja upean silauksen sisustusprojektille. Toimitamme valaisimen asennusvalmiina kohteeseen, jolloin esim. johdon pituus ja kytkentätapa ovat valmiiksi oikeat. Se säästää asennuksessa aikaa sekä vaivaa ja luo viimeistellyn lopputuloksen.Lisäksi voimme toimittaa myös kokonaan räätälöidyt valaisinratkaisut, jotka on suunniteltua vain ja ainoastaan kyseistä projektia varten. Valmistamme kaikki valaisimemme Suomessa käsityövaltaisesti, mikä takaa huippulaadun sekä nopeat ja joustavat toimitukset. Foston valaisimet tarjoavat sisustussuunnitelijalle ja -arkkitehdille runsaasti eri mahdollisuuksia viimeistellä kohde tyylikkäillä kotimaisilla ajattomilla design-valaisimilla, jotka kestävät sukupolvelta toiselle.VARJOSTIMET• Tarjolla useita kymmeniä eri värejä ja pintavaihtoehtoja suurilta akryylilevy-valmistajilta.• Myös metalli ja puu ovat mahdollisia.• Metalliosat voidaan maalata tehtaalla haluttuun sävyyn. JOHDOT• Tarjolla yli 50 eriväristä kangasjohtoa. • Muovijohdon perusvaihtoehdot ovat musta, valkoinen tai läpinäkyvä.• Ripustusjohdon pituus voi olla 1,5-5 metriä.• Valaisimen kytkentätapa voidaan valita halutuksi.KATTOKUPIT• Kattokuppien vakioväri on valkoinen. • Muut vakiovaihtoehdot ovat musta, punainen, hopea ja pronssi. • Muita värejä saa tilauksesta halutussa sävyssä.• Kartoiden perusmuodot ovat puolipallo sekä kartio ja muita malleja saa tilauksesta.ESIMERKIT ASIAKASKOHTAISISTA TILAUSVÄREISTÄ JA MATERIAALEISTA VALAISIMISSA INFO MAKSUTAVAT TOIMITUSTAVAT TIETOSUOJASELOSTE PALAUTUKSET FOSTO - Bright Scandinavian DesignFosto jatkaa tinkimättömästi vuosikymmenten perinteitä laadukkaiden, kestävien ja näyttävien design-valaisinten valmistajana sekä uusien valonnäyttäjien luojana. Pysyäkseen kauniina katseltavana vuodesta toiseen on tärkeää että sitä käsitellään oikealla tavalla. Valaisimen kupu on valmistettu akryyli-muovista, joka naarmuuntuu väärin käsiteltynä. Jotta naarmuuntumisriski saataisiin minimoitua, noudata valaisimen puhdistuksessa seuraavia ohjeita: - Pölyn poistaminen: Pölyhuiska, staat- tinen pölyhuiska on paras vaihtoehto.- Runsas pölykerros: Pyyhkiminen kostealla ikkunapyyhkeellä sekä tarvittaessa miedolla pesuaineella.- Valaisinkuvun pinta naarmuuntuu pyyhittäessä sitä kuivalla rätillä tai wc/talouspaperilla. - Naarmujen poisto: Erikoiskiillotustah- nalla jota voi tiedustella tehtaaltamme info@fosto.fi INFO MAKSUTAVAT TOIMITUSTAVAT TIETOSUOJASELOSTE PALAUTUKSET FOSTO - Bright Scandinavian DesignFosto jatkaa tinkimättömästi vuosikymmenten perinteitä laadukkaiden, kestävien ja näyttävien design-valaisinten valmistajana sekä uusien valonnäyttäjien luojana. Turvavalaistus on yksi tärkeimmistä turvallisuusjärjestelmistä.Me toimitamme kaiken tarvittavan. Lue lisää Opastevalaisimet Lue lisää Yksikköakkuvalaisimet Lue lisää Turvavalaisimet Lue lisää Turvavalokeskukset Lue lisää Exilight OyExilight on perustettu 2003 ja toiminut valaistusalalla jo kahdeksantoista vuotta. Olemme koko historiamme ajan panostaneet ammattitaitoiseen asiakaspalveluun, jatkuvaan tuotekehitykseen sekä laadukkaisiin turvavalaistuksen tuotteisiin ja järjestelmiin. Suunnittelemme ja valmistamme tuotteemme Suomessa. Pääkonttorimme sijaitsee Pirkkalassa. Yrityksemme perusarvoja ovat vastuullinen liiketoiminta ja asiakastyytyväisyys. Ota yhteyttä Tuotteitamme voi tiedustella myös sähkötukkuliikkeiltä. Uutiset SULKAVUOREN JÄTEVEDENPUHDISTAMO Tampereen Sulkavuoren kallion sisäiset louhintatyöt aloitettiin vuonna 2018. Tekniikkaurakat aloitettiin huhtikuussa 2022 ja samalla turvavalaistushankinnat Katso lisää » Exilight Oy ja Salok Osk ovat sopineet yhteistyösopimuksen! Sopimuksen tavoitteena on helpottaa Salok Jäsenyritysten kaupankäyntiä ja laskutusta Exilight Oy:n tarjoamien tuotteiden ja projektien Katso lisää » Exilightin uutuudet kiinnostivat messuvieraita Jyväskylässä 7.-9.9.2022 järjestetyt Pohjoismaiden suurimmat sähkömessut olivat menestys – jälleen kerran. Kolmipäiväisten messujen yli kymmenen Katso lisää » Exilightin uudet Supernova+®-opastekyltit ja EXIoT Firegate esillä Jyväskylässä Suomen sähköalan ammattilaiset kokoontuvat kahden ja puolen vuoden tauon jälkeen Jyväskylään. Normaalisti kahden vuoden välein Katso lisää » Terveyden ja hyvinvoinnin laitos (THL), Helsinki Terveyden ja hyvinvoinnin laitokselle (THL) on valmistunut Helsingin Mannerheimintielle uusi K-rakennus. Katso lisää » Vanha arvokiinteistö sai ajanmukaisen turvavalaistuksen Helsingin Hakaniemessä, Pitkänsillan toisella puolella, sijaitsee arvokas, yli 100 vuotta sitten valmistunut kauppakiinteistö. Katso lisää » IoT-pohjainen turvavalojärjestelmä joustaa joka vaiheessa Exilight tomitti Espoonlahteen kauppakeskus Lippulaivaan langattoman EXIoT-turvavalaistusjärjestelmän Katso lisää » Ympäristö ISO 14001 on maailman tunnetuin ympäristöasioiden hallintajärjestelmän malli. Sen avulla organisaatio voi kokonaisvaltaisesti ja tavoitteellisesti parantaa ympäristöasioidensa hallintaa ja edistää kestävää kehitystä. Tutustu lisää Modernit IoT-ratkaisut. EXIoT –pilvipalveluintegraatio tarjoaa asiakkaillemme tänä päivänä vaihtoehdon siirtyä digitaaliseen aikaan (IoT). EXIoT –pilvipalveluintegraatio Suunnittelu Suunnittelemme ja toteutamme lähes kaikki tuotteemme alusta loppuun itse. Suunnittelun lähtökohtana pidämme korkeaa laatua, tyylikästä ulkoasua sekä tuotteen pitkää elinkaarta. Proudly made in Finland.Our products PL1 pendant light LuminousWood light panels and cladding T1 luminous coffee and side tables T2 luminous dining and lounge tables T3 luminous coffee tables T4 luminous side table DL1 desk lamps for computer work WL1 wall lightsCustomised lighting Architectural and decorative lightingWhether manufacturing designer luminaires or lighting solution for specific architectural and decorative lighting needs AICCI® is the strong partner. We help you make your lighting successful by providing manufacturing consultation service including luminaire engineering and lighting design services as needed. Contact us Lighting to industry needsOur customers come from many different industries and companies of all sizes. We are a lighting manufacturer and respond to our customers' needs in a collaborative manner with design and engineering design services and by manufacturing customer-specific lighting solutions at our premises in Muurame. Tell us about your industry-specific lighting needs. Contact us Photo byEmmi. Good feeling with light We in AICCI believe in light as the source of strength. A good light, a right type of light, makes you feel good and boosts your energy levels. With light it is especially important how it feels. The way anyone sees and experiences light – feels the light – is individual. This is partially the reason why the requirements for light differs between applications and users. Our luminaires lights are therefore adjustable and also tailored to the specific when needs of the client, finding the optimum solution for the intended use. We delight in the aesthetics, ethicalness and eco-friendliness of our operations and products. Aesthetics means to us not only visual beauty, but also all the emotions our products evoke in their users, similarly to light. Ethicalness means that we have the highest regard of individuals, our interest groups and the environment. As for ethicalness, we challenge ourselves to consider our operations and products comprehensively, from the choice of production methods and materials to the end of the product life cycle. By these actions we believe that we bring good mood with our lights. Products Light panels LuminousWood panels Table lamps AICCI T1 AICCI T2 AICCI T3 AICCI T4 Pendant light Workstation lamps Wall lights Customised manufacturing Customised lighting Marine solutions About us Company Our story Contact us Contact us 0 Custom size LED light panels The AICCI LP2 LED light panel gives you the freedom to innovate and create luminaires and illuminated surfaces. AICCI LP2 is a versatile light panel, designed for circular lighting and has been in AICCI’s range since 2007. Available in different sizes and appearance, IP rated and impact resistant. Suitable installation where stylish, durable and the easy-care luminaire is required. The frame is available in untreated aluminium, anodised or powder coated. An illuminating surface can be, for example, beautifully aging 8 mm glass. Thanks to its flat and durable construction and unparalleled lighting properties, the AICCI LP2 is suitable for everything from small to large surfaces, as a single luminaire, wall, ceiling and furniture cladding, signage, decoration and artwork. Image surfaces and art presentation In addition to lighting, AICCI LP2 is ideal for visual communication and art presentation. The backlight brings images and its colours to life. The work can be printed on acrylic or, for an even higher quality result, on low-metal glass, in which case the image is permanently attached to the glass at high temperature. The final touch can be done by defining and adjusting the lights easily according to the needs of the work and the lighting of the space. The final result is visually of high quality, durable for time and use. Signpost and information board Light panels can also be used in many ways in communication. For those looking for, designing a decorative and an artistic surface, the luminous surface can be realised as printed digitally, screen printed, or lenticular. Lens printing allows the different effects as image flips, animated and 3D images. Also, adhesive and antistatic films can be attached to the luminous surface. Our numerous options give you the freedom to choose the most suitable light panel solution for your design. We will help you to choose the best materials and technology for your project. Specifications Applications Indoors and outdoors Enclosure class IP 40, IP44 and IP54 When you need a higher IP enclosure class light panel for your lighting application, we can manufacture the light panel according to your needs with additional protection of the enclosure. Dimensions Available in custom sizes. Maximum size 2000 x 3000 mm / 78.74″ x 118.00″ Thickness 30 mm / 1.18″ Frame width 30mm / 1.18″ Shape The AICCI LP2 light panel can have a symmetrical or asymmetrical polygon shape consisting of straight sides. Such are squares, rectangles, triangles, pentagons and hexagons, etc. The AICCI LP2 light panel cannot be round or its side cannot be a curved side. If you need a round or curved light panel, please contact us for a suitable solution. Structure Panel frame is extruded aluminium The structure shall be opened and dismantled in such a way that the light panel can be serviced and all materials, including lighting and electrical components, can be replaced. Maintenance can be made only by a qualified person. All parts shall be capable of being removed, sorted and recycled at the end of their useful life. Materials The frame is extruded aluminium: untreated, anodised (see our shades), powder coated in RAL colour or Decoral textural coating. The Decoral method makes the aluminium frame look like the desired wood or stone. In terms of technical durability, the treatment is as durable as powder coating. The illuminating surface can be safety glass, acrylic, polycarbonate or PETG. The luminous surface can be printed. Printing options include digital, silkscreen or lens printing. Lens technology enables different image effects on the light panel: rotate, animation and 3D depth shots. Lights We offer light sources that take into account your application and your budget. Define your goals for light quality and we’ll help you choose the right light sources for your application. Do you want white, adjustable white, RGB, RGBW or intelligent LED lighting? Or if your project requires the use of specific project-specific LEDs. Specify your LEDs to us and we will manufacture the light panels to your exact requirements. We only use professional-grade, high-quality LED lights to guarantee the quality and durability of your implementation, as well as provide an AICCI manufacturer’s warranty. LED light source efficiency up to 200 lm/W Lighting control and electrical connection Lighting control according to the needs of the application, e.g. on/off, potentiometer dimming, Casambi, DALI or DMX or other project-specific control. The electrical connection can be implemented with a fixed or plug-in cable, as desired. The control device is external. Optics For the illuminating surface, you can choose opal laminated glass, opal acrylic, microprism, opal acrylic + microprism, and polycarbonate. Uniform glare rating can be achieved according to EN 12464-1 with a UGR of 16 to <19. The choice of optical materials and their combinations affects the value. Special solutions are possible on request. Installation Surface mounted, with concealed fixing, screwed through the edge, and hinged. Circularity Robust construction, designed to last. The structure can be opened and dismantled so that the light panel can be serviced and all materials, including lighting and electrical components, can be replaced. Thanks to edge lighting technology and panel design, replacing LEDs is simple, and LEDs on the hinged panel can be replaced without removing the light panel. The material and light sources for the illuminated area can be selected according to the intended use and can be changed if the use of the device changes. The LEDs we use are professional standard products, so their availability or that equivalent products are likely for decades to come. The control gear is external. To ensure the quality of light and operation, as well as safety of use, all modifications and maintenance must be carried out in accordance with AICCI guidelines, and only by a qualified person. All components can be removed easily, sorted and recycled at the end of their useful life. Welcome to contact a lighting specialist Contact our specialist and we help you with a solution and implementation best suited for you. Products Light panels LuminousWood panels Table lamps AICCI T1 AICCI T2 AICCI T3 AICCI T4 Pendant light Workstation lamps Wall lights Customised manufacturing Customised lighting Marine solutions About us Company Our story Contact us Contact us 0 Illuminating natural wood surfaces and panels AICCI LuminousWood gives you the freedom to innovate and create fully customised luminous genuine wood surfaces, characterised by aesthetic and exceptional versatility, used to promote well-being in visionary architectural projects. Our wood surfaces and lighting solution set the benchmark for flexibility and reflect our dedication to push aesthetic and technological boundaries. Benefit our comprehensive project support from initial design stage to installation. AICCI LuminousWood panel AICCI LuminousWood light panels are suitable for cladding and illuminating walls, suspended ceilings, furniture and soundproof partitions, or as a single eye-catcher, to illuminate either from one or both sides. Maximum size 1200×3000 mm, minimum thickness 12 mm. Available shaped into different shapes and flame retardant treated. Instal with a mounting system, magnets or screws White 2700K, 4000K, 6500K or 2000-6500K LEDs Lighting control on/off, dimming, Casambi, DALI or DMX, or another project specific The panel structure can be opened for maintenance. Download product description Tuotetietoa suomeksi Woods We manufacture AICCI LuminousWood light panels according to the customers’ specifications. There are several options to choose from, where each type of wood has its own characteristics, individual natural tone and pattern, and light transmittance. Pine Spruce Fir Olive ash Rotary cut birch Sliced birch Curly birch Aspen American linden Flame maplePeople-friendly lighting Both wood and light hold deeper significance for our well-being. AICCI LuminousWood natural wood surface provides a warm and natural feeling. The light filters beautifully through the wood and enhances the texture of the wood. By adjusting the light intensity and colour temperature, you can accentuate the wood’s own shade or tint it by changing the colour temperature (K) of the white LEDs. AICCI LuominousWood light panels are designed for adaptability and people-friendly lighting. See below how the shade of the AICCI LuminousWood light panel made from Finnish birch changes when it is switched on and the colour temperature of the light is adjusted. Light off 5500K 4000K 2700KWall cladding and panel installation system Would you like to use different wood veneer panels in the same installation? You can combine LuminousWood panels with traditional wood veneer panels and acoustic perforated panels. The AICCI WMS 500/600 series wall cladding and panel installation system is designed to be flexible for a variety of wall cladding applications, and also supports durability as the panels can be easily removed from the profiles for maintenance. The panels can be installed vertically or horisontally. Explorer AICCI wall installation system Learn more and realise your vision Our solution includes personalised support from initial consultation to installation. Our designers and acclaimed network of specialists offer end-to-end project support at your request. Products Light panels LuminousWood panels Table lamps AICCI T1 AICCI T2 AICCI T3 AICCI T4 Pendant light Workstation lamps Wall lights Customised manufacturing Customised lighting Marine solutions About us Company Our story Contact us Contact us 0 AICCI T2Luminous dining and lounge tables Our vision was to design a table that creates an atmosphere for dining and gathering. A table that lives in the rhythm of the day of the people around it. AICCI T2 is an enchanting ambience creator that gathers people around it to enjoy, tune in and cultivate joy. Changing the mood to more focused or relaxed is discreet and effortless thanks to the built-in adjustable lights and lighting control. Curated materials The AICCI T2 tables’ design and materials are in the perfect balance. The design takes into account different environments, from indoors to covered outdoor terraces and balconies. The legs of the table are made of solid birch. The warm tone of the wooden legs has been implemented through a chemical-free heat treatment process that gives the natural light-toned birch wood a beautiful dark brown shade. At the same time, thermos treatment makes the wood suitable for outdoor use, and resistant to moisture and pests. The steel frame of the table is laser-cut and folded to shape, and is ecologically powder coated to ensure durability, and reduce waste and emissions. Tabletop’s optics are made of laminated satin-finish glass and acrylic. This makes the light distribution even and enables a soft light. The satin-finish ensures effortless cleaning and feels pleasant to the touch, and does not pick up reflections that might disturb the eye. Timeless yet contemporary Tables’ timeless yet contemporary Nordic style appeal to both sight and touch. Slim silhouette and adaptable lighting give the table a dynamic look. A minimalist aesthetics characterised by rounded edges, smooth wood surfaces and clean lines are designed to fit seamlessly in any gathering space from dining room to casual meeting areas. With controllable light user can complement any new or existing scheme just by changing lights intensity and colour. Personalised comfort AICCI T2 dining and lounge tables provides a contemporary way to use combination of the table and light. AICCI T2 table adds possibility to personalise comfort by giving us an alternative that is appealing and functional. Increasing comfort by table’s easy-to-use lighting control which allow to set lighting according to user’s various needs throughout the day. Specifications AICCI T2 luminous tables are available in two models: AICCI T2D and AICCI T2L. The AICCI T2D are dining tables and the AICCI T2L are lounge tables. Both table models are available in four different sizes. The AICCI T2 luminous tables are designed and made in such a way that they can be placed indoors and on covered terraces and balconies. AICCI T2 tabletop illuminates in two directions, with 1/3 of the total light directed upwards and 2/3 downwards. The wireless lighting control for the tables switches the light on and off and changes dimming, hue and intensity, among other functions. The light sources for the AICCI T2 tables, can be selected to match the desired style according to your choice of either tunable white or coloured LEDs. Provides a very soft yet intense light that filters through a subtly layered structure, ensuring glare-free and anti-reflective light. Designed to create maximum comfort for circadian lighting and frequently changing lighting needs. AICCI PL1 WAVE’s exceptional design, extensive light control and high color rendering make it the perfect luminaire for comfortable task and general lighting. Suitable for use above a table and in open spaces where superior human–friendly adaptive lighting is required. Suspended effortlessly from its wooden ceiling canopy. Specifications Materials Diffusion fabric, Trevira CS 100% Frame and ceiling canopy, birch Microprism diffuser plate, acrylic Light optics, acrylic Wires and rods, steel Diffusion fabric The fabric is flame-resistant Trevira CS. The properties of the fabric are based on the chemical structure of the fabric fibers and have not required any additional flame retardant treatment that is harmful to the environment. And it is a permanent feature of the fabric that does not face over time. Meets important international fire safety standards for homes, hotels, restaurants, care sector, public buildings and maritime shipping etc. The fabric is certificated with Oeko-Tex Standard 100, IMO-Hanging and EU Ecolabel. Trevira CS is 100% recyclable. Diffusion fabric attachment The diffusion fabric attaches with magnets and steel rods and can be removed, reattached and replaced. Wood Wood used for the AICCI® PL1 wave pendant panel light grows in PECF certified commercial forests in Finland. Maintenance Pendat light has openable and serviceable structure where LEDs and control gear, including lighting control units, can be repaired and replaced by a qualified person. All lighting and electrical components can be serviced and replaced. Products Light panels LuminousWood panels Table lamps AICCI T1 AICCI T2 AICCI T3 AICCI T4 Pendant light Workstation lamps Wall lights Customised manufacturing Customised lighting Marine solutions About us Company Our story Contact us Contact us 0 AICCI DL1 desk lampsOptimised for computer work The AICCI DL1 desk lamp series is designed to support healthier computing and improve workstation usability. You can easily create your own individual and adjustable lighting that supports your well-being and work. The AICCI DL1 desk lamp is the ideal lighting solution for improving work comfort and productivity. Ideal for both office and home office use. AICCI DL1 desk lamps provide optimal, ergonomically wide light distribution for computer work, preventing eye fatigue and irritation. The Casambi lighting control in the desk lamp allows you to adjust the light intensity and colour temperature from cool to warm. Ensures flexible lighting control of each desk lamp individually and in groups. Despite group control, each user can easily create their own work lighting and adjust it according to their personal and changing needs. Technical specifications Tunable whiteLight colour according to individual requirements. Warm white, neutral white, daylight white? You have all light colours in one luminaire! The AICCI DL1 desk lamps have tunable white LED lights that are adjustable from 2000K to 6500K. The dimming and light hue value is continuously adjustable. And always outstanding colour rendering with Ra >90. For best visibility, highest concentration and healthy eyes. Ultra-fast chargingEasily accessible sockets and USBs for smooth working. Where are the sockets and USB ports? With the AICCI DL1 CCS version, these are always at your fingertips and organised along the lamp arm. Power sockets and ultra-fast USB A and C ports for charging devices. Easy and fast connections for smooth work flow. AICCI DL1 620C desk lamp with light directed downwards. AICCI DL1 1120CS desk lamp with light directed upwards and downwards. Desk lamps for circularity The AICCI DL1 desk lamps are designed for circular lighting. It is an approach to continue production in a more sustainable and environmentally friendly way. In AICCI’s production, circular lighting means careful design with sustainability in mind: we maximised own and local manufacturing, as well as the longest possible service life of the materials and parts used in lamps. In addition to ergonomics, this luminaire is designed with the environment in mind. It has everything you need, but nothing extra. Sturdy metal construction, durable optics, professional-quality long-lasting energy-saving LEDs and lighting control for human-friendly lighting. No moving parts that can increase the need for care and maintenance. The structure can be opened for maintenance so that lighting and electrical components can be repaired or replaced. All materials are recyclable at the end of their useful life. Technical specifications The AICCI DL1 desk lamps are available in two widths: 620 mm/24.4″ and 1120 mm/47.2″. In addition to the standard white colour, we also manufacture the luminaires to match the RAL colour chart for each project. The lamps high quality, highly adjustable light is ideal for colour management tasks alongside computer work, thanks to its high colour rendering index <90 CRI/Ra. For product-specific specifications, please see the PDF attachments below. See the AICCI DL1 620 desk lamp installation video A handy cable tray is also available. See the AICCI DL1 1120 desk lamp and AICCI DL1 CH1 cable tray installation videoAccessoriesAICCI DL1 CH1 cable tray The AICCI DL1 CH1 cable tray is an accessory for AICCI DL1 desk lamps that helps keep workstation cables organised. The cable tray simply attaches to the table bracket of the AICCI DL1 table lamp and sits under the table without the need to attach the cable tray to the table. Characteristics – Made of powder coated steel for durability – Mono-material & 100% recyclable – Simple cable management – No need to screw to the table – Improves especially height-adjustable desk usability – Enough space for typical computer setups including cables, control gear and power strip units etc. Dimensions W64cm x D11,3cm x H5,2cm / W25.2″ x D4.49″ x H2.5″ The corners of the cable tray are open, allowing the wires to enter neatly and the whole looks good. LED luminaires designed and manufactured in Finland for general and horticulture lighting market. About us Building on excellence since 2007, we are committed to driving innovation that helps advance the LED industry toward a more sustainable and energy-efficient future. We are a high-quality LED luminaire designer and manufacturer based in Finland. With deep-rooted Nordic values, we aim to provide premium quality, sustainable, and technologically advanced LED luminaires. We currently have two brands under our company, Valoya and GreenluxLight, focusing on horticultural and general lighting market segments, respectively. Valoya helps growers and researchers worldwide to improve plant cultivation with premium quality horticultural LED lighting through our industry’s leading plant biology research and development. GreenluxLight creates energy savings for customers worldwide with its energy-efficient general lighting solutions. Both brands offer carefully engineered, high-end LED fixtures suitable for small- and large-scale installations with a competitive return on investment. Latest Updates Product Configurator Our Brands Valoya is known as research driven horticultural LED lighting solutions provider. Our patented, broad spectra optimize plant growth in crop science, crop production (Greenhouse, CEA, medicinal plants and vertical farming) and other (Algae etc.). With 600+ plant trials on 300+ plant species, we are the knowledge leader of the industry. Valoya has subsidiaries in the USA and India to serve the markets in those respective countries. Find out more about our horticultural lights. Read more about our horticultural lighting GreenluxLight is a pioneer in advanced general lighting LED solutions in the Nordics. GreenluxLight fixtures are designed and manufactured in Finland to give the core Nordic touch and design. With a strong track record for lighting in retail shops, parking garages, warehouses, and industrial applications, GreenluxLight has been the preferred choice for these applications across the Nordics since 2007. About us Building on excellence since 2007, we are committed to driving innovation that helps advance the LED industry toward a more sustainable and energy-efficient future. We are a high-quality LED luminaire designer and manufacturer based in Finland. Our environmentally friendly products combine design, safety and accessibility in innovative ways and can also be used for decorative purposes. Stairs, train stations and public spaces Glowway pathway markings and signs Patented Glowway pathway markings and signs improve navigation in emergency and everyday conditions. Our environmentally friendly products combine design, safety and accessibility in innovative ways and can also be used for decorative purposes. Glowway -Lighting your way in the dark. Glowway’s photoluminescent products offer elegant and safety-enhancing floor-level guidance and comfort for normal and emergency situations. Studies show that floor-level emergency exit markings significantly shorten evacuation times in emergencies. Glowway products do not have components that need to be replaced, they are therefore maintenance-free and durable, and operate reliably in a proven cost-effective manner, saving on, for example, electrical maintenance costs. Most of our products can be customized according to request and we are also able to manufacture custom-made products. Our products are also designed to take into account the access control needs of the visually impaired. ValaistusratkaisutReferenssitVALAISTUKSEN TOTEUTUS KOKONAISVALTAISENA RATKAISUNA Yksilöllinen valaistussuunnittelu, räätälöity ratkaisu laadukkailla LED-tuotteilla ja ammattitaitoinen asennuspalvelu. Tutustu palveluumme ja tilaa maksuton kartoituskäynti! VALAISTUSTARPEEN KARTOITUSKartoitamme valaistuksen nykytilan ja käymme yhdessä läpi tarpeet ja toiveet uudelle valaistukselle. Tarvittaessa kartoitus voidaan tehdä myös etäyhteyden avulla. VALAISTUS- SUUNNITELMAKartoituksen pohjalta teemme juuri kyseisiin tiloihin sopivan yksilöllisen valaistussuunnitelman ja valitsemme kohteeseen sopivan valaistusratkaisun. TAKAISINMAKSU- LASKELMALiitämme suunnitelmaan myös takaisinmaksulaskelman, joka kertoo tulevan energiansäästön ja investoinnin kannattavuuden. ASENNUS JA KÄYTTÖÖNOTTOToimitamme tuotteet sovitussa aikataulussa sovittuun paikkaan. Halutessasi huolehdimme myös valaisimien ammattitaitoisesta asennuksesta ja käyttöönotosta. Tilaa maksuton kartoitus Nimi* Organisaatio Sähköposti* PuhelinViesti*Suojattu reCAPTCHA-palvelun avulla Tietosuoja / Ehdot Tilaa maksuton kartoitusAUTAMME SINUA NÄKEMÄÄN ASIAT PAREMMASSA VALOSSA Olemme suomalainen energiatehokkaisiin LED-valaistusratkaisuihin erikoistunut yritys, jonka tavoitteena on parantaa asiakkaiden hyvinvointia ja kilpailukykyä energiaa ja luontoa säästävillä vaihtoehdoilla. LAATUA JA KOTIMAISUUTTA ARVOSTAVALLE VALTAVALO ON LUONTEVA VALINTA LED-valaistukseen siirtyminen alentaa valaistuskustannuksia merkittävästi niin pienemmän energiankulutuksen kuin alhaisempien asennus- ja huoltokulujen ansiosta. Valitsemalla Valtavalon valaistusratkaisun tuet samalla suomalaista työtä. KOKONAISVALTAINENSaat kaiken tarvittavan tasokkaan valaistuksen toteutukseen: yksilöllisen suunnittelun, laadukkaat tuotteet ja ammattitaitoisen asennuspalvelun. KOTIMAINENOlemme kotimainen LED-valaistuksen asiantuntija. LED-valonlähteemme valmistetaan omassa tuotantolaitoksessamme Kajaanissa. LUOTETTAVA TOIMIJAToimitamme LED-ratkaisut jo yli 10 vuoden kokemuksella. Valtavalo on yksi LED-aikakauden uranuurtajista Suomessa. VAIHDETTAVUUSRatkaisu on käytännössä huoltovapaa, ja valaistuksen päivitys onnistuu helposti ja nopeasti vain valonlähteen vaihdolla. KESTÄVÄ JA EKOLOGINENRatkaisuillamme säästetään vuodessa CO2-päästöjä noin 4 000 tonnia eli yli 8 tuhannen Helsinki-New York-lennon verran. LAADUKKAAT TUOTTEETLaadukkaat pitkäikäiset tuotteet kestävät myös haastavissa olosuhteissa ja säästävät näin huolto- ja ylläpitokustannuksissa. TUTUSTU TOIMIALAKOHTAISIIN VALAISTUSRATKAISUIHIN Toteutamme kokonaisvaltaiset ratkaisut eri toimialoille jo yli kymmenen vuoden kokemuksella. Lue lisää tai ota yhteyttä valaistuksen asiantuntijoihimme! Siirry sisältöön Valikko Etusivu Valaisimet Asiakkaitamme Myymälä Ota yhteyttä Verkkokauppa Kiinnitystuotteet Kristallit Lampunkannat ja holkit Lasikuvut ja varjostimet Nippelit Ripustustuotteet Valaisinjohdot ja pistotulpat Oma tili Toimitusehdot Yksilöllisten kristallivalaisimien suunnittelua ja valmistusta käsityönä ensiluokkaisista materiaaleista Suunnittelemme ja valmistamme lähes kaikenkokoisia ja -mallisia kristallivalaisimia sekä yksityisille että yrityksille. Mallistostamme löytyvät kruunut, plafondit sekä monia erikoisvalaisimia. Valmiiden mallien lisäksi voit tilata täysin ainutlaatuisen valaisimen. Tutustu valaisinmallistoomme Plafondit Kruunut Erikoisvalaisimet Näin tilaat valaisimen Ota yhteyttä ja selvitetään yhdessä toiveet valaisinmallista, sen koosta sekä tilasta johon se sijoitetaan. Tämän jälkeen voimme antaa valaisimesta hinta-arvion. Valaisimen lopullinen hinta ja toimitusaika määräytyy koon, rungon rakenteen ja pintakäsittelyn sekä kristallien ja valaisinosien määrän mukaan. Myös valaisimen toimitus- ja asennuspalvelu järjestyy kauttamme. Ota yhteyttä Kaskadin myymälä avattu Helsinkiin, Korkeavuorenkatu 5 Tervetuloa tutustumaan Kaskadi-tuotteisiin myymälässämme. Esillä on myös muita sisustustuotteita. Katso aukioloajat Palvelut Kristallivalaisimien suunnittelu ja valmistus, vanhojen valaisimien entisöinti ja valaisintarvikkeiden myynti Myymälä Korkeavuorenkatu 5, 00140 Helsinki Ota yhteyttä Saku Laakso, puh. 0400 985618 Katja Laakso, puh. 050 4370770 Yhteydenottolomake Paja Hommansbyntie 353, 07870 Loviisa VerkkokauppaKiinnitystuotteet Kristallit Lampunkannat ja holkit Lasikuvut ja varjostimet Nippelit Ripustustuotteet Valaisinjohdot ja pistotulpat Oma tili Toimitusehdot Email Facebook Instagram © 2024 Kaskadi-valaisimet • Built with GeneratePress

fi fi en Valikko Koti Tuotanto Laatu ja ympäristö Rekrytointi Yhteystiedot Lisää Tuotanto Erikoisvalaisimet ja sähkökeskukset Täytämme laivateollisuuden tekniset vaatimukset MirTer Oy valmistaa valaisimia ja sähkökeskuksia laivateollisuuden tekniset vaatimukset täyttäen.Teemme valaisimet ja sähkökeskukset suunnittelusta toteutukseen. Sähkökeskukset toteutamme niin laivoihin, maatalousteollisuuteen, teollisuuskiinteistöihin kuin asuinkiinteistöihinkin.5000 m2 tuotantotiloistamme löytyvät mm. CNC-levytyöstökeskus, särmäyspuristimet ja oma jauhemaalauslinja. Näillä varmistamme joustavan tuotannon, niin pienien kuin suurienkin erien kohdalla.Isoissa tuotantoerissä pystymme hyödyntämään emoyrityksemme Säkylän Aaltek Oy:n asiantuntemusta sekä erikoisosaamista johtosarjavalmistuksessa.Materiaalit hankimme sekä kotimaisilta että kansainvälisiltä valmistajilta ja jälleenmyyjiltä. Tämä varmistaa korkean laadun oikeaan hintaan. Tuotannon auditointitodistus Tarjoamme: Toiminnanohjausjärjestelmällä (ERP) tuettu toiminta. Tällä voimme seurata tuotteiden kaikki vaiheet tilauksesta aina toimitukseen reaaliajassa. Teemme asiakkaillemme tuotesuunnittelua käyttäen nykyaikaisia 3D-CAD ohjelmia, kuten Vertex G4 ja PTC Creo. Osaava henkilöstö, jolla on arvokasta kokemusta. Nykyaikainen tuotantolaitos. Laaja kokemus meriteollisuuden tarpeista ja vaatimuksista. Suunnittelu ja tuotanto kommunikoivat keskenään jatkuvasti ja avoimesti varmistaen, että asiakkaan määrittelemät vaatimukset ovat ajantasalla. Tuotantomme soveltuu kerta- ja sarjatuotantoon ja varastoimme varaosia tarvittaessa. fi fi en Valikko Koti Tuotanto Laatu ja ympäristö Rekrytointi Yhteystiedot Lisää Laatu ja ympäristö Laadun periaatteetAsiakaslähtöinen toimintamalli siten, että tuotteemme ja palvelumme täyttävät asiakkaidemme kanssa yhdessä sovitut vaatimukset. Prosessiemme jatkuva parantaminen. Tämän tavoitteen saavutamme poistamalla havaitsemiemme virheiden perussyyt. Edellytykset, joilla virheetön työn ja toiminnan laatu saavutetaan. Johto informoi henkilöstöä kehittämiseen liittyvistä suunnitelmista ja muutoksista. Suunnittelusta valmistukseen asti otamme asiakkaan määrittelemät laadun kriteerit osaksi omia työvaiheitamme. Sarjanumeroinnilla pystymme jäljittämään tuotteen ja siihen liittyvän dokumentoinnin. Tuotantomme tavoitteena on koko ajan toimia kokonaistaloudellisesti parhaalla mahdollisella tavalla. Tämä tuo etua sekä asiakkaillemme että Säkylän Aaltekille.YmpäristöarvotYritys sitoutuu ottamaan huomioon kaikki ne viranomaisten ja sidosryhmien vaatimukset ja velvoitteet, joita toiminnastamme aiheutuu. Ympäristöasioiden tehokkaan hoidon toteutamme sitoutumalla noudattamaan kestävän kehityksen yleisperiaatetta toiminnoissamme.MirTer Oy asettaa itselleen myös omat ympäristönsuojeluun liittyvät tavoitteensa. Tavoitteenamme on saavuttaa kilpailuetua ympäristöasioiden hallinnan kautta kaikissa tuotteissamme.Nykyisten prosessien ympäristövaikutukset tunnetaan analysointien perusteella ja niitä valvotaan luotettavasti. Toiminta-ajatuksenamme on selvittää uusien tuotteiden ja palveluprosessien ympäristövaikutukset jo niiden suunnitteluvaiheessa.Toimintamme periaatteita ja päämääriä pidämme yllä avoimella tiedottamisella, sekä keskusteluilla sisäisten ja ulkoisten sidosryhmien kanssa.Materiaalien hankinnoissa ja niiden käytössä otamme huomioon luonnonvaroja säästävät menettelytavat ympäristövaikutuksineen.Henkilöstö koulutetaan niin, että jokainen osaa edistää ympäristön kannalta hyviä toimintatapoja.
